biotools.summary: Base-pairing profile local alignment is a powerful method that evaluates the similarity between a pair of RNAs taking into account secondary structure information. Based on the accurate similarity calculated by BPLA kernel, you can perform a broad range of structural RNA analysis, including family prediction, hierarchical clustering, and remote homology search.

bioschemas.name: BPLA kernel
